# leftThumbstickButton

**Instance Property**

The button on the left thumbstick of the controller.

## Declaration

```swift
var leftThumbstickButton: GCControllerButtonInput? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the thumbstick has a clickable component, this is a digital button.

## Getting thumbstick and thumbstick button inputs

- **leftThumbstick**: The controller’s left thumbstick element.
- **rightThumbstick**: The controller’s right thumbstick element.
- **rightThumbstickButton**: The button on the right thumbstick of the controller.

items.description: The button on the right thumbstick of the controller.
